bgibbons.game.entities

Class Mob

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgibbons.game.entities.Entity
      • bgibbons.game.entities.Mob
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, Player

    public abstract class Mob
extends Entity
    A class to extend entities to moving objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Mob

        public Mob(Level level,
           java.lang.String name,
           int x,
           int y,
           int maxHealth,
           int speed,
           int rank,
           int maxExp)
        Constructor for the Mob object.
        Parameters:
        level - Level to for the mob to be added to.
        name - Name of the mob.
        x - The x coordinate of the mob.
        y - The y coordinate of the mob.
        maxHealth - The max health the mob is to have, whole numbers preferred.
        speed - The speed of the mob.
        rank - The starting rank of the mob.
        maxExp - The exp needed for the mob to rank up again.

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public void move(int xa,
                 int ya)
        Moves the mob to a target direction
        Parameters:
        xa - The x direction to move the mob.
        ya - The y direction to move the mob.

      • hasCollided

        public abstract boolean hasCollided(int xa,
                                    int ya)
        Method to check if the mob has collided if it were to move to a direction
        Parameters:
        xa - The x direction the mob would move to.
        ya - The y direction the mob would move to.
        Returns:
        A boolean, true if will collide, false otherwise.

      • isSolidTile

        protected boolean isSolidTile(int xa,
                              int ya,
                              int x,
                              int y)
        Checks if the mob is moving into a solid tile.
        Parameters:
        xa - The x direction the mob would move to.
        ya - The y direction the mob would move to.
        x - The mob's current x location.
        y - The mob's current y location.
        Returns:
        A boolean, true if the tile the the mob would be moving onto is solid, false otherwise.

      • isTouching

        public boolean isTouching(Entity entity)
        Checks if mob is touching another mob
        Specified by:
        isTouching in class Entity
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to compare caller mob to.
        Returns:
        A boolean, true if the mobs are touching, false otherwise.
